Articles.Content: Hello, I just got this game last week. I must say I am having a blast with this game. I have a lot to learn and a lot to do, but this so much fun.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hello Dh397, and welcome to the forums!

The game and this forum make for a great learning experience. Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
Hi Dh397 welcome to the game and to the community! Hang around and check out what these awesome people have created.

Welcome to the forums, one of the nicest places to be on the web! And believe me... fun gets even better, when you have learned a lot ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif).

Cant wait to see your creations!

Be seeing you in orbit!
